system.sustained: Power requires a source of flame within Psy Rating Metres. Power originates from this source of flame, firing as a Psychic Barrage of one bolt, +1 per two degrees of success up to a maximum number of bolts equal to Psy Rating at a target individual and line of sight (can be dodged as if a ranged attack) each bolt after the first may hit the same target or any within 2 metres of them within range and, dealing 1d10+Psy Rating Energy Damage. If scoring 4+ Degrees of Success on Focus Power Test it also sets target on fire.
